seniority_level.evidence: 3 years minimum experience with no 'Senior' in title, typically maps to mid-level (3-5 years)

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with focus on BI/DW projects, reporting and visualization

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting and visualization with ETL tools (DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) - no streaming mentioned

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports; focus on individual contributor work like analysis, requirements, design, development

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms mentioned (AWS, Google, Azure) with no clear primary - all listed as required skills

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major clouds (AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure) explicitly mentioned as required skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on reporting, visualization, and ETL tools suggests batch processing; no streaming or real-time mentioned
